title: Great
comment: Seems to work every time what more can you ask for thank

title: Worst alarm clock, doesn't switch off!
comment: As mentioned by several others, this stupid thing completely freezes when it goes off so you can't snooze it or dismiss it, it's there going off with nothing you can do other than remove the battery! Yeah, because you really want to be doing that when you've just woken up at 5.30am! Uninstalled, load of rubbish.

title: Perfect
comment: A nice basic alarm clock without any silly extras and without any ad's. I love the option for it to be mandatory to hold dismiss as this prevents accidental dismiss when you intended to snooze. If your just after a basic alarm clock this is the one for you.

title: Amazing Alarm
comment: Best alarm app I have ever downloaded......for FREE... Sooo simple to use....perfect for me as I always worry that my alarm will let me down and I cannot afford to be late for work....This ALWAYS works 😁 Thank you

Hi!
Thanks a lot for your review:-D We do value reliability above all, but if you really cannot afford be late to work, I would suggest taking precautions. The reason is simple. Android itself is not always reliable enough. in 0.005 % of cases something might be wrong with RTC clock or something else. Therefore I would suggest a fallback measure.

title: Simple and efficient
comment: This is exactly the alarm app that I was looking for. I love the simplicity and I've been testing it for a few days and I haven't had an issue. I also love that alarms can be extended if you feel like sleeping in one day but doing so won't change your regular alarm time. I'll be upgrading to the premium version.
Works no hassle.

title: Amazing app!
comment: I downloaded a rom and noticed the dev didn't include the alarm app.  I found this one and it truly is amazing and does what it says. Great job dev.
Glad that you like it:-) You can send a link or my email to the ROM maintainer if you want him to include this app into the ROM.
Nice and simple to use!!!!

title: Lightweight and User Friendly
comment: Lightweight and user friendly alarm clock app. Alarm goes off in silent mode. Easy to set.

title: Nothing more than standard app
comment: Does nothing the preinstalled clock app doesn't already do.

Hi!
That is not true. There are lots of reatures which are not present in the standard alarm clock. Besides, it is not a reason for a bad review. Would you give a expensive car a bad review just because it "Does nothing the cheap car does not do"?

title: Great but lacking a detail
comment: This alarm clock is great, I love how easy it is to change the alarm time. But every time I change the alarm time I have to tap AM. I would like a setting to have it permanently in the AM to not have to confirm every day that I'm a normal person that wakes up in the morning.

title: One thing
comment: I love this app. So far my only concern is, unlike most alarm apps it is affected by the sound profile. I have my sound profile low overnight so I'm not woken up by a text or email alert, but the alarm should override that. Did I miss that option?

title: THE ALARM DID NOT GOES OFF (DOES NOT RING)
comment: Like the design---simple and no ad but The Alarm did not goes off. Hence I late for work. Uninstalling! Having  given it enough time.  adjusting the setting and volume It just didnt work!!

Hi,
you can adjust the volume and use other melodies. If you still find it hard to wake, put your phone in an empty glass (this will increase the volume) .

title: Excellent!
comment: Thanks to the dev!

title: Died
comment: Worked great for about 4 days. It completely died now. Unintelligible.  Can't risk it not working when I need to get up for work.

Hi!
If the application suddenly stops working (there were no updates) it usually means that something is frozen in the system for example a common problem is the Real-Time-Clock system component. You should try to reboot your device.

title: Just Right

title: Works good
comment: This alarm is effective and reliable easy to use one suggestion I would have is some way to have an alarm go off a couple days in the future but not have it repeat that day every single week unless you want it to repeat every week Also trying to delete alarms once your queue becomes full could be improved by clicking all the alarms you want removed at once.  Is there a way to add a function so that you can choose to delete the alarm when it gives you the option to snooze or dismiss?

title: Perfect for my needs.
comment: Works flawlessly.

title: simple to use,  no clutter
comment: there are tons of alarm clock apps.. i have tried at least 10. it seems that everyone has forgotten what am alarm clock should do.. wake you up!   the others are offering so many extra features that the main function gets lost and it's easy to make a mistake when setting up the alarm.  this one is the only one that is easy to set up,  has beautiful design,  no bloatware.. just works... I would be happy to pay for it..  but "unfortunately"  it's free :)

Hey) Thanks for the review. There is a premium version if you want to support us, just check "Other apps from developer"). I am also considering putting a "donate" button somewhere, but it must be out of the way. Maybe somewhere in Settings...
Too hard to shut it off. Should be an EASY way to do it.
One click of a button? What can be easier? If you have troubles with longlick, just switch it off in settings.

title: Alarm
comment: Good

comment: Working great. Please add world clock.

Hi!
Unfortunately we will no implement this. We believe that simplicity is the key and therefore our application will remain purely an alarm clock. We will think about creating a separate World clock application though.

title: 6 stars worth
comment: Great app, you will be pleased. I love the clean GUI and NO ads!

title: Good
comment: I do not have the toggle switches, only check boxes next to each alarm to turn them on or off. Does not match the screenshots. Also, please disable back button and menu button when alarm is playing.

Hi,
designs differ because you have an older android version. Unfortunately Android market does not allow to upload more than 7 screens.

title: Not the best!
comment: Edit to Yuriy:  how rude can you be?!? Let me speak in small words so you can understand. There is only a small amount (like around 5) of alarm sounds. My volume was up, and it was still very soft. Yes I was clicking on the button for it to snooze and it would not stop! This app sucks and does not work for my needs.                            From the 1st alarm that went off, I've had problems. The volume is not very loud at all, there is very minimal alarm choices for alarm sounds to choose from, and when alarm goes off, it takes anywhere from 3-5 mins for snooze to take affect, by that time your wide awake, and then doesn't even go off again when set snooze time is up! not good at all. I do not recommend for anybody!

Thank you for your reply. Now I can understand. I did not mean to be rude, you have to cut me some slack as this is a foreign language for me.
You can adjust volume in settings and this will be exactly what you will hear. Regarding the problem with snooze button - this is a first complaint for 150000 downloads, so I would rather blame it on Asus.
Like the customized snooze options

title: uninstalling it won't sound when your phone is on Mute

Could you please explain why? This is an easy change, of course, but I do not want to clutter the settings :-) You can write here or http://geektracker.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/ALARMCLOCK-18
Very good
Great simple and ad free! Thanks! Can please add periods longer then 30min in the auto silence option?

title: Perfect alarm clock

Changed to 5 stars and will be buying next stable release. :)

Hi,
thanks for the update:-) We are glad to provide ad-free experience for you guys.

title: Love it

title: Was great
comment: Was working great 5star, Till update. Installed 1/21/15 release after uninstalling prior version as suggested in read me. Now no more alarm screen before unlock, cannot snooze or dismiss from notify screen (shows options but does not do any), only way to stop alarm was to manually launch app and un-check the alarm. Busted... I did uninstall and reinstall a second time with same results.  Samsung S3.

Hey Ron,
I have just installed version 2.7.11 directly from the Google Play and it worked out great. Last update changed only pre-alarm labels and had absolutely nothing to do with waking up the screen and using notification bar. What I think has happened is that notification was not properly cleared after reinstall. Try to reboot your device.

title: Amazing for me
comment: This app is a perfect mix of features. I love all of them and works flawlessly. I wish the fade-in worked a bit better, but that is it!

title: Useful alarm but not for me!
comment: Changed as realised the issue isn't with the app but with the LG g3,  since upgrading to lollipop it is impossible, from what i can tell from my many attempts at fixing this, to use a sound alarm while phone is in silent mode! Otherwise the app does work perfectly!

Hi!
Thank you for clarification that you are on Lollipop. In Lollipop there are 3 mute modes: None (not even alarms), Priority and All. Obviously, alarm will only work in Priority and All modes and will not work in None. I have just tested on an LG device with Lollipop on it and alarm was working perfectly. Please consider changing your review.
The Best

title: Its too! clean on galaxy note2
comment: Zero ads thus far and layout is far simpler than some of the ridiculous alarms ive seen. Haven't actually used it yet will change my rating if reliability is compromised.  One small bug..The default alarm and this app battle when deciding who will display the active alarm icon in the notification panel. Even if 2 alarms are set say 5 mins apart. I like 2 alarms incase one should go "android" on me and not sound ( which has happened)

Hi,
yes, indeed, alarm applications do compete for displaying their alarms on the lock screen. Unfortunately, this feature is not very well implemented in the Android and it does not support multiple applications. Therefore last one wins.

Thus far I have not received any negative feedback concerning reliability on Samsung devices.

Cheers

title: Very nice app

comment: Can't click dashclock widget to get to my alarms.

title: No bull, just a straightforward alarm
comment: I love the simple functionality of this program. However, I wish it would let me use any sound file on my device rather than the preset alarm sounds. I know you can manually add to them, but it's a hassle, especially since I get sick of the tune I'm using fairly quickly

title: Best alarm
comment: Simple add that 5 stars well deserved

title: Still not "simple" enough!
comment: I really miss the alarm on my old Nokia phone, which I could easily set to any time in 5 seconds with my eyes closed - literally. I still remember the sequence of shortcut keys to do it. Why are smartphone alarms so complicated? Even with this "simple" alarm, I first have to launch the app, THEN touch the "add" button, THEN touch "Time", and only THEN do I get a numeric keypad to enter the alarm time. Is it too much to ask that a truly simple alarm app should let me enter the time on its FIRST screen?

Hi,
thanks for your review!

Unfortunately, simplicity has to be always a comprimise. We are considering to popup the time picking window immedeately when creating a new alarm. But you still have to click - launch app, click "add". Do you think this will be helpful?
absolutly the best clock app!

title: Easy to use
comment: This alarm is so easy to use, love being able to set how long to wait when hitting the snooze.

title: Great Alarm Clock

title: I love it!!!
comment: It is so simple!!  One question will the alarm go off in random times? I hope not Cause the other alarm I used to have drove my house guest nuts because at 9:00/9:30 it went off at such a random time and drove her crazy. I hope this alarm clock doesn't do that.

Hi,
thanks for you review. Alarm goes at time which is written on the lock screen or in the application main screen near the bottom. If alarms are off, nothing goes :-)

Please be advised that if pre-alarm feature is on, alarm will quietly start before the time specified!

comment: simple and responsive

title: Great developer, great app
comment: Thanks to the extremely flexible and friendly developer, the alarms list is now sorted nicely because of my feedback. I love this alarm app so much, and now it's even better. Highly recommended for a nice clean replacement for stock.

title: Good
comment: Does what it says. Simple and clean.

title: Good one
comment: Auto silence cannot be set less than 5 mins. This is one drawback

title: The best
comment: Simply the best replacement for stock alarm

title: I like this app
comment: It has intelligible and nice looking interface, not too much settings, only the most useful ones. Gentle pre-alarm feature is also nice to have. The time-picker is very convenient. It’s good, that it doesn’t rotate, when I rotate the phone. Looking forward to adjustable volume setting for pre-alarm! I would also add fast setting of snooze duration, because sometimes I want to snooze a little bit more, but I don’t want to go to the settings and set new snooze duration. Anyway, I think this is a great beginning, thank you for a nice app!
